mapper.insert: insert into db_product_avg (SKU, SELLNUM2, SELLNUM1, DIFF3, DIFF4, SELLNUM6, QUSHI, PURCHASEDAY, RESERVE3, SELLNUM0, RESERVE2, YYYYMMDD, DIFF5, DIFF2, SELLNUM5, RESERVE1, RESERVE4, DIFF1, SELLNUM4, DIFF0, DIFFAVG, SELLNUM3, DIFF6, 'DAYS' ) values (#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellnum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellnum1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diff3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diff4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellnum6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qushi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchaseday,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellnum0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diff5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diff2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellnum5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diff1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellnum4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diff0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diffavg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellnum3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diff6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{days,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update db_product_avg set SELLNUM2 = #{sellnum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLNUM1 = #{sellnum1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFF3 = #{diff3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFF4 = #{diff4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLNUM6 = #{sellnum6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUSHI = #{qushi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASEDAY = #{purchaseday,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLNUM0 = #{sellnum0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMMDD = #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIFF5 = #{diff5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFF2 = #{diff2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLNUM5 = #{sellnum5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFF1 = #{diff1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLNUM4 = #{sellnum4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFF0 = #{diff0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFFAVG = #{diffavg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLNUM3 = #{sellnum3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFF6 = #{diff6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'DAYS' = #{days,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SKU, SELLNUM2, SELLNUM1, DIFF3, DIFF4, SELLNUM6, QUSHI, PURCHASEDAY, RESERVE3, SELLNUM0, RESERVE2, YYYYMMDD, DIFF5, DIFF2, SELLNUM5, RESERVE1, RESERVE4, DIFF1, SELLNUM4, DIFF0, DIFFAVG, SELLNUM3, DIFF6, 'DAYS' from db_product_avg where SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
